title: Bug 34509tag names that are xml:Name but not java identifier are not accepted
description: Bug 34509tag names that are xml:Name but not java identifier are not accepted
OB: However, for Tomcat 5.5.8, if the name is not a legaljava identifier, then a compilation error occurs. For instance, Tomcat won'taccept Da~te`Tag as a legal name for the Tag.
EB: According to the JSP 2.0 specification, custom tag prefix and name should beof the type XML:Name.
